text: {"id":2729516918,"number":3939,"state":"open","locked":false,"title":"MCP session replay integration test","body":"Lets you set up an MCP server (stdio only for now), some interactions (tool calling only for now) and record the whole thing to a session replay file. Then commit the replay and result files and the test will run the interaction through the extension manager.\r\n\r\nThis works by using two new binaries included in this PR: one that sits in front of a stdio server, writing all i/o to a replay file, and one that reads said replay file and mimics the behavior of the recorded
